originalText.text: Great service and professionalism. Robert P was amazing 10/10 will recommend thank you sobo & sobo

text.text: Great service and professionalism. Robert P was amazing 10/10 will recommend thank you sobo & sobo

originalText.text: From the time I stepped into the office of sobo&sobo I was treated with the upmost respect and compassion for the ordeal I lived through. Juliana O'Grady, my assigned lawyer, was so caring and straight forward at informing me of every progress of my case. The whole team worked vigorously to get the best reward for my injuries. They went above and beyond the call of duty in my case. I am forever grateful to the very capable team. I recommend them to everyone who needs the best representation and I asked God to bless them all.

originalText.text: Justin said yes!  When my original attorney’s dropped me. Multiple attorneys would not take my case either. My highest praises to Justin Osborne for a positive outcome.  Thank you, Justin!

text.text: Justin said yes!  When my original attorney’s dropped me. Multiple attorneys would not take my case either. My highest praises to Justin Osborne for a positive outcome.  Thank you, Justin!

originalText.text:
I had the pleasure of working with Henry Nelson through my I-30 and I-485 applications and I can’t recommend him enough. He made the entire process as stress free as possible by cracking jokes and being as helpful as possible.

He answered all my questions and concerns, kept me updated and informed through the process, and made sure I never felt confused or overwhelmed.

Most importantly he was incredibly thorough and caught multiple mistakes I had made. He saved me from a big headache (and maybe even a rejection - ughh!!).

Nelson worked countless hours with me to ensure my application were done correctly and did so pro bono. He was a godsend and I don’t know where I would be without him.

Nelson worked countless hours with me to ensure my application were done correctly and did so pro bono. He was a godsend and I don’t know where I would be without him.

originalText.text: Mr. Stuart Mosbacher treated me with kindness,  dignity and respect. He did a phenomenal job on working on my case and in the end he did me justice. So thank you again and again!! Fantastic  law firm...
